DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose trial determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) , maximum acceptable dose ( MAD ) evaluate dose limit toxicity ( DLT ) oral vorinostat patient malignant lymphoma .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Oral Suberoylanilide Hydroxamic Acid ( SAHA ) Patients With Malignant Lymphoma ( 0683-030 )
DOC.criteria: Patients relapse complete partial response , ineffective previous chemotherapy Patients history chemotherapy , antibody therapy , radiotherapy , previous 4 week ( 6 month radioisotopelabeled antibody ) Any uncontrolled concomitant illness Are pregnant breastfeed Serious drug food allergy
